name: Reversi xVSx
summary: Playtest release From Japan Time 2024/ 3/ 29 5:30 to 2024/ 4/ 15 23:59. It is set to open signup, so you can join without approval. There is no obligation to report bugs. REVERSI xVSx is a party game where 1 to 10 people can play Reversi. You can play CPU battle or up to 5 vs 5 online matches
